SEARCH

Class G16_LON

java.lang.Object
G16_LON
public class G16_LON extends Object
Represents a loan offered by the bank. A `Loan` object holds information about a specific loan, including its ID, principal amount, interest rate, start date, term (in months), and calculated monthly and total payments. It also provides methods to retrieve loan details and display them in a formatted way.
